attributes.action: Petition to put speed bumps on Endon Road Norton Green
attributes.additional_details: People come speeding down the road and it is a danger zone for people trying to cross aswell as going about there to day to day business. Many people are in agreement that something needs to be done about it so that we as a community feel more safe and can protect ourselves and our loved ones when walking down the street
attributes.background: In hope that the government do something i am asking along with many others to put speed bumps on Endon Road Norton Green

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
